Packet Sniffer Module¶

This is the main module for packet sniffer homework.

pktsniffer.file_exists(file_path)¶

Checks if a file exists based on the file path provided

Parameters:

file_path (str) – String of the file path

Returns:

file_path with cap_folder_name prepended if valid, else raises ArgumentTypeError

Return type:

str

pktsniffer.filter_pkt_proto(args, pkt)¶

verifies if packet abides by the proto qualifier filter criteria

Parameters:

  • args (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object with parsed arguments

  • pkt (Pyshark Packet) – Pyshark packet to verify

Returns:

pkt if verified, else None

Return type:

Pyshark Packet or None

pktsniffer.filter_pkt_type(args, pkt)¶

verifies if packet abides by the type qualifier filter criteria

Parameters:

  • args (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object with parsed arguments

  • pkt (Pyshark Packet) – Pyshark packet to verify

Returns:

pkt if verified, else None

Return type:

Pyshark Packet or None

pktsniffer.setup_parser()¶

Sets up the argument parser for the program

Returns:

parser, an initialized ArgumentParser object

Return type:

ArgumentParser

pktsniffer.setup_proto_args(parser)¶

Sets up mutually exclusive argument group for packet protocol filtering

Parameters:

parser (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object to set up argument group

Returns:

None: parser is modified in place

Return type:

None

pktsniffer.setup_type_args(parser)¶

Sets up mutually exclusive argument group for packet type filtering

Parameters:

parser (ArgumentParser) – ArgumentParser object to set up argument group

Returns:

None: parser is modified in place

Return type:

None
